00140 void VarianceEstimator::estimateFisherInformation
00141 (
00142     const Array< double >& inputA,
00143     const Array< double >& outputA,
00144     Array< double >&       infMatA
00145 )
00146 {
00147     SIZE_CHECK( inputA.ndim( ) == 2 )
00148 
00149     double          mseL = 0;
00150     Array< double > dwL;
00151     Array< double > modelOutputL( outputA.dim( 1 ) );
00152 
00153     for ( unsigned i = 0; i < inputA.dim( 0 ); ++i )
00154     {
00155         model( inputA[ i ], modelOutputL );
00156         mseL += sqrDistance( outputA[ i ], modelOutputL );
00157 
00158         dmodel( inputA[ i ] );
00159         dwL = ModelInterface::dmdw;
00160         dwL.resize( dwL.nelem( ), true );
00161 
00162         if ( i == 0 )
00163         {
00164             infMatA = outerProduct( dwL, dwL );
00165         }
00166         else
00167         {
00168             infMatA += outerProduct( dwL, dwL );
00169         }
00170     }
00171 
00172     mseL    /= inputA.dim( 0 );
00173     infMatA /= mseL;
00174 }

00177 //===========================================================================
00228 void VarianceEstimator::estimateInvFisher
00229 (
00230     const Array< double >& inputA,
00231     const Array< double >& outputA,
00232     Array< double >&       invInfMatA,
00233     Array< double >&       transInvInfMatA,
00234     double&                s2A
00235 )
00236 {
00237     SIZE_CHECK( inputA.ndim( ) == 2 )
00238 
00239     Array< double > infMatL;
00240     Array< double > dwL;
00241     Array< double > dwMeanL;
00242     Array< double > modelOutputL( outputA.dim( 1 ) );
00243 
00244     s2A = 0;
00245     for( unsigned i = 0; i < inputA.dim( 0 ); ++i )
00246     {
00247         model( inputA[ i ], modelOutputL );
00248         s2A += sqrDistance( outputA[ i ], modelOutputL );
00249 
00250         dmodel( inputA[ i ] );
00251         dwL = ModelInterface::dmdw;
00252         dwL.resize( dwL.nelem( ), true );
00253 
00254         if( i == 0 )
00255         {
00256             infMatL = outerProduct( dwL, dwL );
00257             dwMeanL = dwL;
00258         }
00259         else
00260         {
00261             infMatL += outerProduct( dwL, dwL );
00262             dwMeanL += dwL;
00263         }
00264     }
00265 
00266     s2A     /= inputA.dim( 0 );
00267     infMatL /= s2A;
00268 
00269     invInfMatA = invert( infMatL );
00270 
00271     //
00272     // innerProduct yields the same results as matrixProduct (not
00273     // implemented yet) since all matrices are symmetric
00274     //
00275     transInvInfMatA = 
00276         innerProduct( invInfMatA,
00277                       innerProduct( outerProduct( dwMeanL, dwMeanL ), 
00278                       invInfMatA ) );
00279 }

00333 double VarianceEstimator::overallVariance
00334 (
00335     const Array< double >& inputA,
00336     const Array< double >& outputA
00337 )
00338 {
00339     SIZE_CHECK( inputA.ndim( ) == 2 )
00340 
00341     double          mseL = 0;
00342     Array< double > infMatL;
00343     Array< double > invInfMatL;
00344     Array< double > invAdwMeanL;
00345     Array< double > dwL;
00346     Array< double > dwMeanL;
00347     Array< double > modelOutputL( outputA.dim( 1 ) );
00348 
00349         for ( unsigned i = 0; i < inputA.dim( 0 ); ++i )
00350     {
00351         model( inputA[ i ], modelOutputL );
00352                 mseL += sqrDistance( outputA[ i ], modelOutputL );
00353         
00354 
00355         dmodel( inputA[ i ] );
00356         dwL = ModelInterface::dmdw;
00357         dwL.resize( dwL.nelem( ), true );
00358 
00359         if ( i == 0 )
00360         {
00361             infMatL = outerProduct( dwL, dwL );
00362             dwMeanL = dwL;
00363         }
00364         else
00365         {
00366             infMatL += outerProduct( dwL, dwL );
00367             dwMeanL += dwL;
00368         }
00369     }
00370 
00371     mseL       /= inputA.dim( 0 );
00372     infMatL    /= mseL;
00373     invInfMatL  = invert( infMatL );
00374     invAdwMeanL = innerProduct( invInfMatL, outerProduct( dwMeanL, dwMeanL ) );
00375 
00376     return scalarProduct( dwMeanL, innerProduct( invInfMatL, dwMeanL ) )
00377          + trace( invAdwMeanL );
00378 }

00381 //===========================================================================
00415 double VarianceEstimator::estimateVariance
00416 (
00417     const Array< double >& inputA,
00418     const Array< double >& invInfMatA
00419 )
00420 {
00421     Array< double > dwL;
00422     dmodel( inputA );
00423     dwL = ModelInterface::dmdw;
00424     dwL.resize( dwL.nelem( ), true );
00425     return scalarProduct( dwL, innerProduct( invInfMatA, dwL ) );
00426 }

00429 //===========================================================================
00471 double VarianceEstimator::estimateVarianceChange
00472 (
00473     const Array< double >& inputA,
00474     const Array< double >& invInfMatA,
00475     const Array< double >& transInvInfMatA,
00476     double                 s2A
00477 )
00478 {
00479     Array< double > dwL;
00480     dmodel( inputA );
00481     dwL = ModelInterface::dmdw;
00482     dwL.resize( dwL.nelem( ), true );
00483     return scalarProduct( dwL, innerProduct( transInvInfMatA, dwL ) )
00484       / ( s2A + scalarProduct( dwL, innerProduct( invInfMatA, dwL ) ) );
00485 }
